name: Donut Slices
description:
Donut Slices is a simple but very addictive puzzle game!
Make whole donuts from the different slices and don't forget to watch for the next slice.
How many points can you get?

Features:
- Free to play game
- Simple, but interesting gameplay
- 2 different game modes
- Earn a new donut slices by reaching new levels
- Try to get a higher score!
- New features is coming soon
